service_def.name: PowerPlantManager
service_def.description: The powerplant driver provides the means to control vehicle power plants
service_def.assumptions: Messages may be delayed, lost or reordered.

fixed_field.name: MessageID
fixed_field.interpretation: Two byte field to hold message ID

fixed_field.name: powerPlantID
fixed_field.interpretation: This is a unique ID for each powerplant and is provided by 4507 Report PowerPlant Capabilities message.

fixed_field.name: rpm
fixed_field.interpretation: Rotations per minute. Units here are one since JSIDL does not support RPM natively.

fixed_field.name: throttle
fixed_field.interpretation: As a percent of maximum

fixed_field.name: rpm
fixed_field.interpretation: Rotations per minute. Units here are one since JSIDL does not support RPM natively.

fixed_field.name: throttle
fixed_field.interpretation: As a percent of maximum

record.name: batteryConfigurationRec
record.interpretation: This contains settable state for various powerplant types

fixed_field.name: MessageID
fixed_field.interpretation: Two byte field to hold message ID

fixed_field.name: powerPlantID
fixed_field.interpretation: A list of IDs to query. If the list is empty (count_field=0), all vehicle powerplants will be returned.

fixed_field.name: MessageID
fixed_field.interpretation: Two byte field to hold message ID

fixed_field.name: powerPlantID
fixed_field.interpretation: A list of IDs to query. If the list is empty (count_field=0), all vehicle powerplants will be returned.

fixed_field.name: MessageID
fixed_field.interpretation: Two byte field to hold message ID

fixed_field.name: powerPlantID
fixed_field.interpretation: A list of IDs to query. If the list is empty (count_field=0), all vehicle powerplants will be returned.

fixed_field.name: MessageID
fixed_field.interpretation: Two byte field to hold message ID

fixed_field.name: powerPlantID
fixed_field.interpretation: This is a unique ID for each powerplant and is provided by 4507 Report PowerPlant Capabilities message.

fixed_field.name: rpm
fixed_field.interpretation: Rotations per minute. Units here are one since JSIDL does not support RPM natively.

fixed_field.name: throttle
fixed_field.interpretation: As a percent of maximum

fixed_field.name: rpm
fixed_field.interpretation: Rotations per minute. Units here are one since JSIDL does not support RPM natively.

fixed_field.name: throttle
fixed_field.interpretation: As a percent of maximum

record.name: batteryConfigurationRec
record.interpretation: This contains settable state for various powerplant types

fixed_field.name: MessageID
fixed_field.interpretation: Two byte field to hold message ID

fixed_field.name: powerPlantID
fixed_field.interpretation: Each powerplant has a unique ID associated with it. This ID is used in subsequent messages.

variable_length_string.name: description
variable_length_string.interpretation: A human-readable string that can be used to disambiguate multiple powerplants.

fixed_field.name: MessageID
fixed_field.interpretation: Two byte field to hold message ID

fixed_field.name: powerPlantID
fixed_field.interpretation: This is a unique ID for each powerplant and is provided by 4507 Report PowerPlant Capabilities message.

variable_length_string.name: description
variable_length_string.interpretation: A human-readable string that can be used to describe power plant status, including but not limited to error conditions.

fixed_field.name: percentOilPressure
fixed_field.interpretation: Pressure greater than 100% represents an overpressure situation.

fixed_field.name: engineHours
fixed_field.interpretation: The total runtime of the engine in its lifetime.

fixed_field.name: tachometer
fixed_field.interpretation: Rotations per minute. Units here are one since JSIDL does not support RPM natively

fixed_field.name: percentOilPressure
fixed_field.interpretation: Pressure greater than 100% represents an overpressure situation.

fixed_field.name: engineHours
fixed_field.interpretation: The total runtime of the engine in its lifetime

fixed_field.name: tachometer
fixed_field.interpretation: Rotations per minute. Units here are one since JSIDL does not support RPM natively

fixed_field.name: percentChargeRemaining
fixed_field.interpretation: Percent of maximum.

fixed_field.name: batteryHours
fixed_field.interpretation: The total runtime of the battery in its lifetime

fixed_field.name: percentFluidPressure
fixed_field.interpretation: Pressure greater than 100% represents an overpressure situation.

fixed_field.name: totalHours
fixed_field.interpretation: The total runtime of the hydraulic system in its lifetime

fixed_field.name: totalHours
fixed_field.interpretation: The total runtime of the fuel cell in its lifetime

parameter.interpretation: enveloped query power plant configuration message

action.name: sendReportPowerPlantConfiguration
action.interpretation: Send a Report Power Plant Configuration message

parameter.interpretation: enveloped query power plant capabilities message

action.name: sendReportPowerPlantCapabilities
action.interpretation: Send a Report Power Plant Capabilities message

parameter.interpretation: enveloped query power plant status message

action.name: sendReportPowerPlantStatus
action.interpretation: Send a Report Power Plant Status message

parameter.interpretation: enveloped set power plant configuration message

guard.interpretation: True if the message that triggered the transition is received from the client that is in control of this service AND the message contains valid settings for the specified powerplant types.

action.name: setPowerPlantConfiguration
action.interpretation: Update the settings for the specified powerplants.

parameter.interpretation: enveloped query power plant configuration message

action.name: sendReportPowerPlantConfiguration
action.interpretation: Send a Report Power Plant Configuration message

parameter.interpretation: enveloped query power plant capabilities message

action.name: sendReportPowerPlantCapabilities
action.interpretation: Send a Report Power Plant Capabilities message

parameter.interpretation: enveloped query power plant status message

action.name: sendReportPowerPlantStatus
action.interpretation: Send a Report Power Plant Status message
